On Tue, 29 Jun 2004 09:15:32 -0000, naomasa298$B$5$s(B wrote in message <cbrbvk+prfa@...>
>--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "yukimura1990" 
><yukimura1990@y...> wrote:
>> what was the samurai's name who beheaded yukimura sanada
>
>I believe his name was Nishio Nizaemon.

Yes it is said to be Nishio Nizaemon.  

However this event was part of Natsu-no-Jin (the summer campaign), not 
the Fuyu-no-Jin (winter campaign).
